id.playername: Big Bad Con 2014 Iron Edda PC
id.description: Boyish-looking young smith, formerly of the Clan of the Hammer (pre-rune).

aspects.aspect: ᛚ (Laguz/Water) Runes on Each Inner Forearm

extras.extra: Because Water is slippery, I get a +2 when dodging fluidly

phase.events: Hrothgar had been chosen by the Clan of the Hammer, which was superceded by being marked with the ᛚ rune.
Hrothgar apprenticed to Arnora Ketilsdottir, replacing her as the Holdfast smith after her death.

character.notes: Iron Edda Phases: Phase 1 is Clan/Rune/Bone Giant Phase 2 is an item of importance Phase 3 is a traditional crossing paths phase (From Iron Edda game run by Morgan Ellis at BigBadCon 2014)
